about_the_game:
Would you like to enjoy erotic plays with adorable catgirls in VR?
They will follow you lovingly anywhere you go, squirt, have sex with you, and get horny. It's super erotic and adorable.
You can touch her boobs, her ears, undress her, and change the situations as much as you like.

System:
You can move around freely inside the VR space.
Touch the cube to change the outfit and situation.
Use the video camera to record and the perspective will switch to a large monitor.

Functions:
It is a VR game with 6DoF, so you can observe the girl from all kinds of angles.
You can hold the video camera and adjust the angle and position.
You will be fully immersed with the real-sounding erotic voices and sound effects too.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
